name: cytogenetically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to or uses cytogenetics (= the study of chromosomes and how they affect the behaviour of the body's cells): Only a small proportion of the embryos could be cytogenetically analysed. The cells were shown to be cytogenetically abnormal. Related words
cytogenetic
cytogeneticist
cytogenetics
More examplesFewer examplesWhat proportion of all cases of trisomy 21 are diagnosed cytogenetically before birth?The tissue was found to consist of two cytogenetically distinct cell populations. No evidence of Myelodysplastic Dysplastic Syndrome (MDS) was found morphologically or cytogenetically. All of the 28 cases studied cytogenetically had chromosomal abnormalities consistent with Down's syndrome.
